name: Lands of Dandelion
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Jean, equip this card.
After Jean equips this card, immediately use Dandelion Breeze once.
When your Jean, who has this card equipped, is on the field, Dandelion Field will cause you to deal +1 Anemo DMG.
(You must have Jean in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1502]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1502] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S15023]</color> once.
When your $[A1502], who has this card equipped, is on the field, <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C115021]</color> will cause you to deal +1 <color=#80FFD7FF>$[K105]</color>.
(You must have $[A1502] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Jean</color>, equip this card.
After Jean equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color> once.
When your Jean, who has this card equipped, is on the field, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Dandelion Field</color> will cause you to deal +1 <color=#80FFD7FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color></color>.
(You must have Jean in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Jean to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
